page.title: 08Dulverton's Annual Carnival
page.content: {Great!}A {Carnival}is about to begin. Here comes the band with smart black suits and big brass drums. Next a float of all different colours and shapes. It's Disney World with Mickey Mouse and Donald Duck. The street light shines as the floats pass and soon the atmosphere is loud and noisy with notes of music filling the air. People dressed as apes pounce joyfully on the children. Different smells pass my nose and soon the floats have all gone by.The excitement of the night is gone.
